text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states the general rule regarding costs: \"The court can order the landlord to **pay your legal costs** (in the small claims track this is more limited, but in fast track or multi-track cases, costs can be substantial)\" and also mentions recovering fixed costs and expenses even in small claims.
